title: Best of The Herd: 11/30/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/30/2018
description:
After the Cowboys big win Colin thinks Dak Prescott is simply a better version of Tim Tebow who can only win when the defense and running game are playing great. He thinks people are using irrelevant stats in the new pass happy NFL to justify poor quarterback play. Plus, Super Bowl Champion James Harrison comes in studio and talks about the Cowboys impressive defense that shut down the Saints Thursday night 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
